title.rendered: STEDI CARBON SWITCH PANEL WITH USB AND DIGITAL VOLT METER

content.rendered:
Switch Panel with USB and Digital Volt Meter

DETAILS

12V Switch Panel with USB & Digital Voltage Meter.

  • Twin Port USB 5V USB 3.1A each
  • Digital Voltage Display
  • Display Range 0 to 30 Volts
  • 4 x Dime Switches with Blue LED indicator (Rated at 20A Each)
  • Pre-Wired Connectors & Pig Tails
  • Aluminium Panel with hydro-dipped carbon fiber print.

KEY MEASUREMENTS 

  • Panel Width 82mm
  • Panel Height 160mm
  • Minimum depth required behind the panel is 60mm

SPECIFICATIONS

Switch Panel with USB and Digital Volt Meter

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

1 x Switch Panel with USB and Digital Volt Meter

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI CARBON SWITCH PANEL WITH USB AND DIGITAL VOLT METER

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
